main event: Observers in Ohio and Kentucky reported seeing a bright orange unidentified flying object on January 27, 1968, moving at a very high speed.
interesting points: The object was described as being round and bright orange with a continuous glow in the center and white glowing outer edges., The sighting lasted less than one minute., The object was traveling at an estimated altitude of 2000 to 3000 feet., Multiple witnesses, including local police officers, reported the sighting., Observers noted that there was no predicted satellite data that could explain the observed westerly components.
witness description: Maysville police officers and local residents
